page.title: 01FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {A typical weekend for Richard Baker, {Farm Boy. } I wake up at 8.30 a.m. and get dressed into my jeans and a T-shirt. I hurry downstairs to have my breakfast. I have cornflakes and toast on a Saturday and Sunday. After breakfast I go out to see to my bantams and chicks then I have to clean my show bantams out. Then I have to go and help my dad feed the cows in the fields. First we go to a place called the "Quarry" where we have about 30 acres of land. We have about 50 cattle there and we also store hay and straw in a building near the Quarry house. After that we go up to Rhosesmor. We have about 20 acres there to check then we go back to the farm for dinner. We usually have crackers and cheese for dinner at night.
